CreateWorkspace.name: CreateWorkspace
CreateWorkspace.description: Grants permission to create a workspace

DeleteWorkspace.name: DeleteWorkspace
DeleteWorkspace.description: Grants permission to delete a workspace

DescribeWorkspace.name: DescribeWorkspace
DescribeWorkspace.description: Grants permission to describe a workspace

GetLabels.name: GetLabels
GetLabels.description: Grants permission to retrieve AMP workspace labels

GetMetricMetadata.name: GetMetricMetadata
GetMetricMetadata.description: Grants permission to retrieve the metadata for AMP workspace metrics

GetSeries.name: GetSeries
GetSeries.description: Grants permission to retrieve AMP workspace time series data

QueryMetrics.name: QueryMetrics
QueryMetrics.description: Grants permission to run a query on AMP workspace metrics

RemoteWrite.name: RemoteWrite
RemoteWrite.description:
Grants permission to perform a remote write operation to initiate the streaming of
                                                metrics to AMP workspace

UpdateWorkspaceAlias.name: UpdateWorkspaceAlias
UpdateWorkspaceAlias.description: Grants permission to modify the alias of existing AMP workspace
